task Install the Application
Before you begin, ensure you have administrative privileges on your system.
This task describes how to install the application on your system.
The application supports Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems. Ensure your system meets the minimum hardware and software requirements before proceeding with the installation.
Download the installer from the official website.
Run the installer and follow the on-screen instructions.
Once installation is complete, launch the application.
After launching, you may need to configure initial settings such as user preferences and network configurations.
